seo.title: Contact MapleGrowth Digital — Get in Touch | Strategy Call Booking
seo.description: Contact MapleGrowth Digital for your digital marketing needs. Book a free strategy call or send us a message about SEO, PPC, web development, and growth marketing.

hero.title: Let's Start Your Growth Journey
hero.subhead: Ready to see what strategic digital marketing can do for your business?
hero.body: Whether you're looking to increase organic traffic, improve conversion rates, or scale your digital presence — we're here to help. Book a free strategy call or send us a message to get started.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Multiple ways to connect with our team.

methods.title: Book a Strategy Call
methods.description: Free 30-minute consultation to discuss your goals and explore how we can help.

cta.label: Book Call Now
cta.ariaLabel: Book a free strategy call with MapleGrowth Digital

methods.title: Send Us an Email
methods.description: Have a specific question? Email us directly and we'll respond within 24 hours.

methods.title: Give Us a Call
methods.description: Prefer to talk? Call us during business hours (9 AM - 5 PM EST, Mon-Fri).

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.subtitle: Tell us about your project and goals.

fields.name: message
fields.label: Tell us about your project
fields.placeholder: Describe your business goals, current challenges, and what you're hoping to achieve with digital marketing...

questions.question: What happens after I book a strategy call?
questions.answer: We'll send you a brief questionnaire to understand your business and goals. During the 30-minute call, we'll discuss your challenges, opportunities, and potential solutions. There's no obligation — it's a genuine consultation to see if we're a good fit.

questions.question: How quickly do you respond to inquiries?
questions.answer: We respond to all emails and form submissions within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, feel free to call us directly.

questions.question: Do you work with businesses outside of Canada?
questions.answer: Yes! While we're based in Canada and specialize in the Canadian market, we work with businesses across North America and beyond. Our remote-first approach enables us to serve clients effectively regardless of location.

questions.question: What information should I prepare for our consultation?
questions.answer: Come prepared with information about your business goals, current marketing efforts, target audience, and any specific challenges you're facing. We'll guide you through the rest during our conversation.

questions.question: Is the strategy call really free?
questions.answer: Absolutely! The strategy call is a genuine consultation with no strings attached. We believe in providing value upfront and building relationships based on trust and results.

office.title: Our Office
office.note: We operate as a remote-first team, but our office address is available for correspondence and meetings by appointment.

social.title: Connect With Us
social.subtitle: Follow our journey and get marketing insights.

steps.title: We Listen
steps.description: We'll learn about your business, goals, and current marketing challenges.

steps.title: We Analyze
steps.description: Our team conducts research and develops initial strategic recommendations.

steps.title: We Propose
steps.description: We present a custom strategy and proposal tailored to your specific needs and goals.

steps.title: We Execute
steps.description: Once approved, we implement your campaigns with precision and ongoing optimization.
